page.title: 09SCHOOL SPORTS: FOUR MARKS
page.content: AREA SPORTS DAY: Area Sports is a sports day when losts of schools race each other. My friend Vicki and I were in it. We collected our sports vests and went to our pen, with the people from our school. There were 9 schools altogether. There were flat races, hurdles, obstacle races, relays, and skipping races as well. Four Marks school won the trophy for the Juniors and Infants. The Area Sports took place at Four Marks school. It was a very hot day and everyone was sweating. Some children were allowed to go swimming in the pool at school because it was so hot. I was reserve for one race because the girl who was to be in it had pulled a muscle in her leg. I came second in that race.
